plot: Homer returns from a nuclear power convention a changed man, and Lisa begins to suspect that he has become a domestic terrorist.

Homer returns from a nuclear power convention a day late, eschewing alcohol and pork and with his own prayer mat. Lisa is convinced that he has been brain-washed by Muslims and that he is about to blow up the power plant so she enlists the aid of bipolar FBI agent Annie Crawford. A suspicious Lisa follows her father to work, to find that he has a perfectly rational - if bizarre - explanation for his recent actions.—don @ minifie-1
